python中字符串去除折行

June 18, 2014

使用rstrip函数

import os
import sys
import MySQLdb
import urllib2                                                                                                                          
 
starIds=[]
ups=[]
 
with open("startid.txt", "r") as f:
     for line in f:
          starIds.append(line)
 
with open("up.txt", "r") as f:
     for line in f:
          ups.append(line)
 
for i in range(len(starIds)):
    url=$url
    response=urllib2.urlopen(url);
    print response
